bll

Class Restaurant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • bll.Restaurant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRestaurantProcessing, java.io.Serializable

    public class Restaurant
extends java.util.Observable
implements IRestaurantProcessing, java.io.Serializable
    Restauratn class holds a list of menu items, and contains a map of the orders. It implements the methods from the IRestaurantProcessing interface, and implements serialisable in order to be sserialised
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
